title: When does relegation start happening?
body:
How does relegation work in Lpl china, they have 12 teams? Do you think WE can avoid relegation?

Does MYM have a chance to get out of the basement?

replies.body: I actually think MYM will avoid relegation. They are currently tied with Giants and are better recently
Just watched the MYM game GMB is in full tilt mode.  That Hec building damage when they needed a tank, and 2 righteous glory on MYM.

LPL is a 11 Week engagement. They just started Week 8. So 3 weeks for WE to try to avoid relegation.

MYM seems to have pulled something together against the scatter brained GMB. They may avoid auto-relegation.
